system.description: When you ask someone to work with you toward a shared goal, roll +Sway.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: They refuse and become suspicious of your motives. Future attempts to work with them will be much harder.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: They'll work with you, but choose one: they want something significant in return, they'll only help in limited ways, or they bring their own agenda to the partnership.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: They see the mutual benefit and agree to work together. They'll provide meaningful assistance toward your shared goal.
